spec_data.Name: AllegroOGG
spec_data.Description:
AllegroOGG is an Allegro wrapper for the Ogg Vorbis decoder from the Xiph.org
foundation. This lib lets you play OGGs and convert OGGs to Allegro SAMPLEs
amongst a lot of other capabilites.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 03:16:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ogg library for use with the Allegro game library
